# Government Tender Announcement
## Marine Certified Sewage System at Samuel Risley
### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to replace an existing sewage treatment system on board the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Samuel Risley. The contracting entity is conducting a Request for Information (RFI) to gather more information about this project.

### Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3826613402
- **Publication Date**: January 16, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 16, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: Ongoing, until further notice

### Project Description
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires a new sewage treatment system for the CCGS Samuel Risley as part of a larger goal to implement Marine Certified Sewage Systems across the Canadian Coast Guard fleet.

### Key Details
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
- **Notice Type**: Request for Information
- **_trade Agreements_: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Simoneau, Steve (SPAC/PSPC) at steve.simoneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or refer to the tender notice at <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15143108?extsite=MTUxNDMxMDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Requirements for Submissions
All RFI documents must be submitted on the specified tender closing date and time. Please ensure that submissions meet the specified requirements to avoid rejection. You may review the RFI documents on the provided website. Only submissions that meet the stipulated requirements will be reviewed and considered for this opportunity.
